Oct. 18, 2015 D Auckland Band Association (Youth Section)
Auckland Band Association (Youth Section) 2 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Auckland Band Association Contest auckland-band-association-youth-section
None
Entertainments Contest
Hawkins Theatre, Papakura, Auckland, New Zealand Aggregate - Auckland Bands Association Cup: 1st: North Shore Youth Band, 2nd: Takapuna Grammar School Brass and Dalewool Youth, 3rd: Kumeu Brass
Best Soloist – KBB Auxiliary Cup: Winner: Isabella Thomas, North Shore Youth Band Top School Brass Band – The ABI Music Trophy: Winner: Takapuna Grammar School Brass Best Compere Youth Section: Winner: The Kumeu Kids
Jack McDonnell Memorial Cup for Outstanding Contribution to the Youth of ABA: Mark Close, Kumeu Brass
Oct. 27, 2015, 5:14 p.m. March 28, 2017, 10:29 p.m.
1 North Shore Youth Brass Ken Cant
2 Takapuna Grammar School Brass 1 Ted Dawson
3 Dalewool Youth Band Jillian Christoff Amazing Grace
4 Kumeu Evolution Brass Mark Close
